entry.title: Free To (not) Play
entry.summary:
As I tried to play Dungeon Keeper (mainly because it was a top app on the Google Play Store, I admit I didn't play the old version) I got really (really !!) annoyed by everithing taking so long (24h to clear a fucking block !!) so I searched for others opinion on the inernet.
I found this Youtube Video which really hit the spot and is quite funny so I thought it may be a good share.

category.term: Game Android Free2Play Suck Dungeon Keeper

entry.title: First post... Again...
entry.summary:
Yes, I now... This is at least the 5th times I rebuild Le Petit Monde from scratch and I always let it down few months after...
But I kind of like it and as it's my very own playground I think I'll continue to play with it! :D
This time I'm using Pelican which is basically the same thing as Octopress (which I liked a lot) but written in Python. As I'm more fluent in this language than I'm in ruby I decided to switch. I'm not going to import old post from octopress as they are quite useless...
I may update this blog a few time but I won't make any promess as I'm too lazy to keep them.
Btw, I think the source for everything here will be on my github anytime soon so if you are interested keep a eye for it.
